author: agilliland
msg: ripping out old LanguageUtil stuff which is no longer valid.
- updated old ContextLoader with final tweak to pass down locale from weblog request where needed.
- EOLed old getSupportedLanguages() method from old page helper, that method is no longer applicable, so it just returns null now.

author: radup
msg: - updated the generated files in the XQueryXpath sample
- fixed a syncronization problem with array setters
- changed the SchemaAnnotation.Attribute API to include information about URI mapping

author: gnodet
msg: SM-500: FTPClientPool can't put its clients into passive mode
Patch provided by Jordan Christensen, thx !

author: agilliland
msg: getLanguage() is no longer a standard part of ParsedRequest.
PlanetRequest still uses language, which is based off browser settings.

author: agilliland
msg: with jsps we set the locale used for i18n first to the users defined locale (if they are logged in), otherwise use browser locale.
